# nurbs mesh v.0.6
# 
# NURBS representation of one quarter of a ring, 
#  with inner radius equal to 1 and outer radius equal to 2
# 9th April 2010
#
2 1
1 2
2 3
0.00000   0.00000   1.00000   1.00000
0.00000   0.00000   0.00000   1.00000   1.00000   1.00000
1.00000   2.00000   0.707106781186548   1.414213562373095   0.00000   0.00000
0.00000   0.00000   0.707106781186548   1.414213562373095   1.00000   2.00000
1.00000   1.00000   0.707106781186548   0.707106781186548   1.00000   1.00000
